00026 #include "utility/misc/unit.hpp"
00027 #include <iostream>

00030 using namespace std;
00031 using namespace pwiz::util;
00032 using namespace pwiz::minimxml;
00033 using boost::lexical_cast;

00035 
00036 ostream* os_ = 0;
00037 
00038 
00039 const char* targetXML = 
00040     "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>\n"
00041     "<root name1=\"value1\" name2=\"420\" name3=\"0.666\">\n"
00042     "    <record name=\"nixon\"\n"
00043     "            color=\"red\"\n"
00044     "            number=\"37\">\n" 
00045     "        <quote>I'm not a crook.</quote>\n"
00046     "        <resigned/>\n"
00047     "    </record>\n"
00048     "    <record name=\"clinton\"\n"
00049     "            color=\"blue\"\n"
00050     "            number=\"42\">\n" 
00051     "        <quote>I did <em>not</em> have sexual relations with that woman.</quote>\n"
00052     "        <impeached/>\n"
00053     "    </record>\n"
00054     "    <record name=\"bush\"\n"
00055     "            color=\"red\"\n"
00056     "            number=\"43\">\n" 
00057     "        <quote>Mission accomplished.</quote>\n"
00058     "    </record>\n"
00059     "</root>\n";
00060 
00061 
00062 struct TestOutputObserver : public XMLWriter::OutputObserver
00063 {
00064     virtual void update(const string& output)
00065     {
00066         cache += output;
00067     }
00068 
00069     string cache; 
00070 };
00071 
00072 
00073 void test()
00074 {
00075     ostringstream oss;
00076 
00077     TestOutputObserver outputObserver;
00078     XMLWriter::Config config;
00079     config.indentationStep = 4;
00080     config.outputObserver = &outputObserver;
00081 
00082     XMLWriter writer(oss, config);
00083     if (os_) *os_ << "target:\n" << targetXML << endl;
00084 
00085     unit_assert(writer.position() < 1); // 0 or -1 depending on platform 
00086 
00087     const char* piData = "version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"";
00088     writer.processingInstruction("xml", piData);
00089 
00090     unit_assert(writer.position() == 39);
00091 
00092     XMLWriter::Attributes attributes;
00093     attributes.push_back(make_pair("name1", "value1"));
00094     attributes.push_back(make_pair("name2", lexical_cast<string>(420)));
00095     attributes.push_back(make_pair("name3", lexical_cast<string>(0.666)));
00096     writer.startElement("root", attributes);
00097 
00098     unit_assert(writer.position() == 87);
00099     unit_assert(writer.positionNext() == 91);
00100 
00101         attributes.clear();
00102         attributes.push_back(make_pair("name", "nixon"));
00103         attributes.push_back(make_pair("color", "red"));
00104         attributes.push_back(make_pair("number", "37"));
00105         writer.pushStyle(XMLWriter::StyleFlag_AttributesOnMultipleLines);
00106         writer.startElement("record", attributes);
00107             writer.pushStyle(XMLWriter::StyleFlag_InlineInner);
00108             writer.startElement("quote");
00109             writer.characters("I'm not a crook.");
00110             writer.endElement();
00111             writer.startElement("resigned", XMLWriter::Attributes(), XMLWriter::EmptyElement);
00112             writer.popStyle();
00113         writer.endElement();
00114         writer.popStyle();
00115 
00116         attributes.clear();
00117         attributes.push_back(make_pair("name", "clinton"));
00118         attributes.push_back(make_pair("color", "blue"));
00119         attributes.push_back(make_pair("number", "42"));
00120         writer.pushStyle(XMLWriter::StyleFlag_AttributesOnMultipleLines);
00121         writer.startElement("record", attributes);
00122             writer.pushStyle(XMLWriter::StyleFlag_InlineInner);
00123             writer.startElement("quote");
00124             writer.characters("I did ");
00125                 writer.pushStyle(XMLWriter::StyleFlag_Inline);
00126                 unit_assert(writer.position() == writer.positionNext()); // no indentation
00127                 writer.startElement("em");
00128                     writer.characters("not");
00129                 writer.endElement();
00130                 writer.popStyle();
00131             writer.characters(" have sexual relations with that woman.");
00132             writer.endElement();
00133             writer.popStyle();
00134             writer.startElement("impeached", XMLWriter::Attributes(), XMLWriter::EmptyElement);
00135         writer.endElement();
00136         writer.popStyle();
00137 
00138         attributes.clear();
00139         attributes.push_back(make_pair("name", "bush"));
00140         attributes.push_back(make_pair("color", "red"));
00141         attributes.push_back(make_pair("number", "43"));
00142         writer.pushStyle(XMLWriter::StyleFlag_AttributesOnMultipleLines);
00143         writer.startElement("record", attributes);
00144             writer.pushStyle(XMLWriter::StyleFlag_InlineInner);
00145             writer.startElement("quote");
00146             writer.characters("Mission accomplished.");
00147             writer.endElement();
00148             writer.popStyle();
00149         writer.endElement();
00150         writer.popStyle();
00151 
00152     writer.endElement();
00153 
00154     if (os_) *os_ << "test: (" << oss.str().size() << ")\n" << oss.str() << endl;
00155 
00156     unit_assert(targetXML == oss.str());
00157     unit_assert(writer.position() == (int)oss.str().size());
00158     unit_assert(writer.position() == 568);
00159 
00160     if (os_) *os_ << "outputObserver cache:\n" << outputObserver.cache << endl;
00161     unit_assert(targetXML == outputObserver.cache);
00162 }
00163 
00164 
00165 int main(int argc, const char* argv[])
00166 {
00167     try
00168     {
00169         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00170         test();
00171         return 0;
00172     }
00173     catch (exception& e)
00174     {
00175         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00176     }
00177     catch (...)
00178     {
00179         cerr << "Caught unknown exception.\n";
00180     }
00181 
00182     return 1;
00183 }
